type: Landscaping and Ground Maintenance Services at the High Commission of Canada in India, in New Delhi
department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada
short_summary: To provide professional landscaping, interior plantscaping, and grounds maintenance services at the High Commission of Canada in India, in New Delhi, and the Official Residence.
description: The Contractor will be responsible to provide a complete range of landscaping, interior plantscaping and grounds maintenance services including all skilled/unskilled manpower, supervision, tools, tackles, equipment, materials, consumables, supplies, training, uniforms, Personal Protection Equipment (PPF) / General Protection Items (GPI) and transportation at the High Commission in New Delhi and the Official Residence.
duration_in_months: This will likely take 2-3 months following the contract award, aimed for the month of June 2024.

full_summary:
**Landscaping and Ground Maintenance Services at the High Commission of Canada in India, New Delhi**
======================================================================================

**Tender Reference:** cb-964-10643329
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** 24-244115

**Tender Publication and Closing Dates:**
------------------------------------

*   **Publication Date:** March 13, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 26, 2024 02:00 PM (local time)

**Notice Type:**
---------------

This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Supply and Services (SRV) category.

**Contract Duration:**
-------------------

*   **Expected Contract Commencement Date:** June 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Expiry Date:** May 31, 2026

**Service Requirements:**
-----------------------

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada is seeking proposals for professional landscaping, interior plantscaping, and grounds maintenance services at the High Commission of Canada in India, New Delhi, and the Official Residence. The services include:

*   **Landscaping**: Professional landscaping services, including all necessary manpower, supervision, tools, equipment, materials, consumables, and supplies.
*   **Interior Plantscaping**: Interior plantscaping services, including all necessary manpower, supervision, tools, equipment, materials, consumables, and supplies.
*   **Grounds Maintenance**: Comprehensive grounds maintenance services, including all necessary manpower, supervision, tools, equipment, materials, consumables, and supplies.

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:**
--------------------------------------

*   **Eligibility**: The bidder must meet the eligibility criteria outlined in the solicitation documents.
*   **Evaluation Criteria**: Proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price.

**Important Dates and Contact Information:**
------------------------------------------

*   **Amendment Date:** April 26, 2024
*   **Contact Information:** Claude Raymond, internationalproposals@international.gc.ca, 343-203-0000

**Attachments:**
-----------------

For complete details, please refer to the tender notice and attachment links provided at: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34035/\*.pdf, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/34035/\*.
